医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
生物安全柜的主要见解在本次采访中，行业专家 Seth DePenning 深入探讨了生物安全柜 (BSC) 的关键作用，并强调了 HEPA 过滤器的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Key-Insights-into-Biological-Safety-Cabinets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Key-Insights-into-Biological-Safety-Cabinets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e33698c9-f8a1-495e-90f2-807e8acbbece Fri, 14 Jun 2024 02:21:00 -0400 Key Insights into Biological Safety Cabinets
短期戒酒会恶化酒精使用障碍患者的肠道健康《PLoS ONE》上发表的一项研究发现，AUD 患者短期戒酒会加剧肠道菌群失调并增加精神困扰，与预期的改善相反。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Short-term-alcohol-abstinence-worsens-gut-health-in-alcohol-use-disorder-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Short-term-alcohol-abstinence-worsens-gut-health-in-alcohol-use-disorder-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4c142e5-6fac-4361-be8f-ada77f3a4798 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 01:38:00 -0400 Short-term alcohol abstinence worsens gut health in alcohol use disorder patients
谷歌推出 PHIA：人工智能驱动的可穿戴健康数据洞察Google 工程师开发了 PHIA，这是一个基于法学硕士的代理系统，它使用信息检索和高级代码生成来分析来自可穿戴健康追踪器的行为健康数据，提供个性化的健康见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Google-unveils-PHIA-AI-powered-insights-from-your-wearable-health-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Google-unveils-PHIA-AI-powered-insights-from-your-wearable-health-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ecf469c-5e3e-47f9-8699-b820228d9dc9 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 00:58:00 -0400 Google unveils PHIA: AI-powered insights from your wearable health data
基于血液的生物标志物可以彻底改变阿尔茨海默病的诊断和治疗最近的一篇综述概述了在人群水平上广泛实施和解释阿尔茨海默病血液生物标志物 (BBM) 的必要因素，强调了早期检测和改进诊断的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Blood-based-biomarkers-could-revolutionize-Alzheimers-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Blood-based-biomarkers-could-revolutionize-Alzheimers-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8242c1ef-70d1-4119-8708-69b04bb489f4 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 00:35:00 -0400 Blood-based biomarkers could revolutionize Alzheimer's diagnosis and treatment
较年轻的肠道菌群年龄可降低老年人心血管疾病的风险研究人员确定了肠道微生物群特征并开发了微生物年龄指标，证明较年轻的微生物年龄可能会降低代谢不健康的老年人的心血管疾病 (CVD) 风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Younger-gut-microbiota-age-reduces-cardioangio-disease-risk-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Younger-gut-microbiota-age-reduces-cardioangio-disease-risk-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1ec2b78-4c22-4b6e-8d1d-91ac762888ca Fri, 14 Jun 2024 00:18:00 -0400 Younger gut microbiota age reduces cardiovascular disease risk in older adults
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：斯科特斯暂时拒绝堕胎药挑战最高法院一致驳回了对美国食品和药物管理局对堕胎药米非司酮的批准和规则的质疑，认为提起诉讼的反堕胎医生组织缺乏这样做的资格。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-SCOTUS-rejects-abortion-pill-challenge-e28094-for-now.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-SCOTUS-rejects-abortion-pill-challenge-e28094-for-now.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22663a18-85d1-44a5-8d7c-da3ed90b3b94 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 15:50:20 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': SCOTUS rejects abortion pill challenge — for now
靶向嗜碱性粒细胞以振兴肿瘤微环境中的细胞毒性 T 细胞肿瘤周围的生态系统，也称为肿瘤微环境，包括免疫细胞、组织、血管和其他相互相互作用以及与肿瘤相互作用的细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Targeting-basophils-to-revitalize-cyto毒-T-cells-in-tumor-microenvironment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Targeting-basophils-to-revitalize-cyto毒-T-cells-in-tumor-microenvironment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58dae978-72ba-468b-a6e4-ea395935cbef Thu, 13 Jun 2024 14:23:00 -0400 Targeting basophils to revitalize cytotoxic T-cells in tumor microenvironment
研究：自付费用影响纳洛酮的获取密歇根大学的研究表明，当患者面临自付费用增加时，他们不太可能服用纳洛酮处方。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-Out-of-pocket-costs-impact-naloxone-access.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-Out-of-pocket-costs-impact-naloxone-access.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2101e472-7445-4856-8103-3323a6ad4f1a Thu, 13 Jun 2024 14:17:00 -0400 Study: Out-of-pocket costs impact naloxone access
研究揭示儿童 DIPG 肿瘤机制密歇根大学健康罗格尔癌症中心的研究人员距离了解儿童 DIPG 肿瘤的工作原理又近了一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-sheds-light-on-pediatric-DIPG-tumor-mechanisms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-sheds-light-on-pediatric-DIPG-tumor-mechanisms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=830b196c-4158-42ba-8d6c-100b0c148679 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 14:05:00 -0400 Study sheds light on pediatric DIPG tumor mechanisms
研究提倡在 TBI 重症监护中自由输血严重脑外伤后增加输血可以帮助重症监护病房住院的患者恢复更大的功能独立性和更好的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-advocates-for-liberal-blood-transfusions-in-TBI-intense-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240613/Study-advocates-for-liberal-blood-transfusions-in-TBI-intense-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1712253f-f853-47c5-82af-643e66680063 Thu, 13 Jun 2024 13:58:00 -0400 Study advocates for liberal blood transfusions in TBI intensive care
